objects.text: • A14 BIONIC CHIP • LIQUID RETINA • ALL-DAY BATTERY

product_details.name: Apple iPad (10th Generation): with A14 Bionic chip, 27.69 cm (10.9″) Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Blue
product_details.description: Country of Origin: China. Product Dimensions: 0.7 x 18 x 24.9 cm; 477 g. Importer: (If applicable) Apple India Private Limited No.24, 19th floor, Concorde Tower C, UB City, Vittal Mallya Road, Bangalore - 560 001. Item Weight: 477 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 7 x 180 x 249 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 1 Count. Generic Name: TABLET.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern promotional layout for a tech product, with a minimal, clean aesthetic and vibrant design elements. The background consists of soft overlapping gradient waves in blue, pink, and yellow tones, with abstract circular accents for added depth and energy. In the center, a large white circular frame outlined with a dotted blue border highlights the product image (`product_image`). 

The top section contains a bold, uppercase headline (`heading`) followed by a slightly smaller subheading (`subheading`), both in a dark blue font. A circular blue badge to the right showcases the discounted price (`price`) in a futuristic typeface. At the bottom, a feature list (`description`) is displayed with centered bullet points. Below that is a call-to-action button background (`cta_button`) filled with dark blue, containing the text (`cta`) in white.

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue: `#0A3B77`
- Sky Blue: `#B5D8FF`
- Royal Blue: `#4389FF`
- Light Blue Background: `#E8F4FF`
- Gradient Pink: `#FF5EBC`
- Gradient Yellow: `#FFCC00`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a sleek blue device body paired with a vibrant, modern display filled with overlapping gradient ovals. The blue device exterior (#7DA5C8) gives a calm, premium feel, while the screen showcases bold, saturated hues to draw attention. The background is a light sky blue (#D4EAFE), setting a clean and refreshing tone. The ovals use bright colors like electric blue (#28A7F3), magenta (#FF2E9D), deep purple (#7C28D8), sunshine yellow (#FFD337), and a soft silver-white (#E6E6E6). These colors blend in smooth radial gradients, creating an energetic contrast while still maintaining visual harmony, ideal for a tech-savvy, youthful banner.
